title: Franchise value of the Cleveland Cavaliers ( NBA ) 2003 to 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and lastly slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 477.0 was reached at Year 2009
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 329.0 was reported at Year 2012
